Q_NAME: Number of swaps in Bubble Sort
Q_DESC:
You have been given an array A of size N  you need to sort this array non-decreasing order using bubble sort. However, you do not need to print the sorted array . You just need to print the number of swaps required to sort this array using bubble sort

Input Format

The first line consists of a single integer N
N denoting size of the array. The next line contains N space separated integers denoting the elements of the array.

Output Format Print the required answer in a single line

Constraints 
1<=N<=100
1<=a[i]<=100
